PHOSPHENIC POCKET LAMP

This lamp, with a diameter of 7cm, is equipped with a double-screen filter and has two lighting modes.

  • Interests in the “double-screen filter”:

This filter has a lighting beam that allows to obtain phosphenes of a better quality than with any other portable lamp.

  • Interests in the “two lighting modes”:

Mode 1 (obtained by pressing once on the on/off button):
The power of the light in this position is ideal for all applications related to education (increased attention and memory, etc.) and soft individual development (improved sleep and relaxation, etc.).

Mode 2 (obtained by pressing twice on the on/off button):
The power of the light in this position is ideal for all applications related to hard individual development (improved emotions and reason, etc.) and initiatic research (revealed hidden talents and powers, etc.).

Note: This portable lamp, whose battery has a wide autonomy, is delivered with its charger and an user manual with detailed instructions.

BULBS FOR PRACTICE
Daylight bulbs. Specially made for Phosphenism.
To be placed in a lamp like architects’ ones.

(A very good complement to the Phosphenic Pocket Lamp)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_orientation=”justified” global_colors_info=”{}”]

These bulbs, approved by Dr. LEFEBURE and distributed since 1963, are traditional bulbs specially designed for the practice of Phosphenism at home.

The tungsten filament and the gas of which they are composed allow them to obtain the same luminous spectrum as daylight, which gives them an unequaled luminosity compared to any other bulbs.

They are not available in others stores because they are made with a special monitoring during their manufacture. And we do not sell them separately.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”T: GUARANTEED DELIVERY FOR ALL DESTINATIONS” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GUARANTEED DELIVERY FOR ALL DESTINATIONS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Interests in the “double-screen filter”: This filter has a lighting beam that allows to obtain phosphenes of a better quality than with any other portable lamp. Interests in the “two lighting modes”: Mode 1 […]
